creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hair comb made from a flat sheet of silver; comb is a half circle with the edges curving away from the center; bristles at the very center; top of cone has ridges and rounded border; three panels on each side; Side 1: phoenix-like bird on left, dragon on right and butterfly over the bristles; Side 2: bird on left, butterfly over bristles, and snake-like dragon on right
title: Hair comb
